name: GUPPERS
description:
Would you like to adopt some GUPPERS of your own?

GUPPERS are loving life long friends and the best part is they are exactly like you! That's right! GUPPERS are made in your image.

Make sure to give your GUPPERS plenty of food, water, love and care.

without these things GUPPERS might not act how you want.

a game by @tnerb_games

with music by @todluk
